LanguageData.BricksDontVanish_NotifyOnFailureTip: RimWorld default: on Toggle notification whenever a colonist fails while constructing.
LanguageData.BricksDontVanish_FailureChanceScalingTip: RimWorld default: 100% Flat multiplier to default failure rate; doesn't affect stat inspection panel. Set to 0% to disable construction failure.
LanguageData.BricksDontVanish_MildFailureChanceTip: RimWorld default: 0% Sets the percentage of construction failures that will not result in loss of materials. No real effect if "Failure materials return" setting is 100%.
LanguageData.BricksDontVanish_FailureMaterialReturnTi: RimWorld default: 50% Scales amount of materials returned on construction failure. 0% for none, 100% for full return, etc.
LanguageData.BricksDontVanish_DeconstructionMaterialR: RimWorld default: 75% Scales amount of materials returned on deconstruction. 0% for none, 100% for "full" (refer to below setting) return, etc.
LanguageData.BricksDontVanish_DeconstructionTrue100Ti: RimWorld default: off By default, RimWorld will never return more than (construction cost)-1 of a material, while deconstructing only. This setting overrides that, allowing for complete returns.
